content:
I am 4th year PhD student at the Electrical and Computer Engineering Department at University of Texas at Austin under supervision of Prof. Haris Vikalo. I received my MSE in Electrical and Computer Engineering department at UT Austin in 2016, and a BS degree in Electrical Engineering from Sharif University of Technology in 2014. I was also a visiting undergraduate researcher at the Department of Electronic and Computer Engineering at Hong Kong University of Science and Technology under supervision of Prof. Daniel Palomar in 2013.
Research Interests I am broadly interested in machine learning, signal processing, and design and analysis of efficient algorithms with a focus on (see the Research page for more details):
 Convex and Nonconvex Optimization Distributed Optimization Discrete Optimization Large-Scale Machine Learning Representation Learning

title: Abolfazl Hashemi
